column1: Fast results.. tighter skin and diminshed wrinkles/sagging. Not shiny or greasy.. an excellent day cream.
My turkey neck was gone in days. I'm telling everybody. Works great.

This has been the worst moisturizer I have ever used. My skin now is rough and as dry as the Sahara desert. The complete opposite of what you expect from a moisturizer. Save yourself the trouble and run the opposite direction.
